short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over a color to highlight all similar colors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the camera icon (to the right of the address bar) to capture the current view, and then (in the newly opened tab) hover over a color to highlight all similar colors.
